actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator McClure under the authority of the order of Jun 29, 84 with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and an amendment to the title. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 1045.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to amend section 1601(d) of Public Law 96-607 to permit the Secretary of the Interior to acquire title in fee simple to McClintock House at 16 Williams Street, Waterloo, New York.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources with amendment (without written report)) Permits the Secretary of the Interior to acquire fee simple title to the McClintock House and related structures, Waterloo, New York, as part of the Women's Rights National Historical Park. Requires the Secretary to remove within a certain time all structures from such property that are not relevant to its historic integrity.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1601(d) of Public Law 96-607 to permit the Secretary of the Interior to acquire title in fee simple to McClintock House at 16 Williams Street, Waterloo, New York.
